name: Swing Thing
description:
Made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 3

Controls:

Space/NUMPAD 5: Select / Jump / Connect

How to play:

Press SPACE or NUMPAD 5 to jump. Press it again to connect to the closest highlighted anchor. Try to collect as many points as possible. 

The points are the other spinning things scattered around the level. Keep a look out for the flashing indicators at the edge of the screen. They point towards the points you need to collect!
